text: jyOti#ShTOmaM prathaqmamupa# yantyaqsminnEqva tEna# lOqkE prati# tiShThantiq gOShTO#maM dviqtIyaqmupa# yantyaqntari#kSha Eqva tEnaq prati# tiShThaqntyAyu#ShTOmaM tRuqtIyaqmupa# yantyaqmuShmi#nnEqva tEna# lOqkE prati# tiShThantIqyaM ~MvAva jyOti#raqntari#kShaqM gauraqsAvAyuq-ryadEqtAnth-stOmA#-nupaqyantyEqShvE#va tallOqkEShu# saqtriNa#H pratiq tiShTha#ntO yantiq tE sa(gg)stu#tA viqrAja# - [  ] 34
